item.title: 受中国市场影响，梅赛德斯盈利下降 28% 后下调利润率预期
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰集团第二季度盈利大幅下滑 28%，原因是其电动乘用车的销量急剧下降，且中国市场需求疲软。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG’s earnings plummeted 28% in the second quarter as sales of its passenger electric vehicles dropped sharply and demand in China weakened.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 东盟领导人认为有机会加强南海外交
item.description: 在中国和菲律宾达成临时协议后，东南亚国家集团看到了在南海主权声索国之间建立外交势头的机会。【原文：A bloc of Southeast Asian nations sees an opportunity to build momentum for diplomacy among countries staking claims in the South China Sea following a provisional according between China and the Philippines.】

item.title: 泰国旅游业复苏势头强劲，增长速度加快
item.description: 由于外国游客人数接近创纪录，促进了私人消费，泰国政府预计经济增长速度将超过最初的预期。【原文：Thailand’s government expects the economy to expand faster than it initially projected, thanks to near-record foreign tourist arrivals boosting private consumption.】

item.title: 如何在彻底转型的经济中开展贸易
item.description:
在本周的《Merryn Talks Money》节目中，作家劳伦斯-麦克唐纳（Lawrence McDonald）将与我们一起讨论他的新书《How to Listen When Markets Speak》

。【原文：

On this week’s Merryn Talks Money, author Lawrence McDonald joins to discuss his book, How to Listen When Markets Speak.

】

item.title: 南非债券在低迷的新兴市场债券市场中大放异彩
item.description: 新兴市场本币债券的前景并不乐观，但南非除外，今年南非本币债券的回报率世界领先，而且有望延续这一势头。【原文：The outlook for emerging-market local-currency bonds is less than rosy — except in South Africa, which has delivered world-beating returns this year and is seen extending that run.】

item.title: 中国经济低迷之际，"逢低买入 "者向香港主要中国 ETF 投入资金
item.description: 随着近期大跌后逢低买进者的回归，追踪离岸中国股票的最大交易所交易基金之一正在吸引资金。【原文：One of the biggest exchange-traded funds tracking offshore Chinese stocks is luring money as dip buyers returned after the recent selloff.】

item.title: 印度资产销售重回聚光灯下的原因是什么？
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 消息称中化集团正洽谈出售巴西油田股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中化集团有限公司（Sinochem Group Co.【原文：Sinochem Group Co. is in talks to sell a minority stake in the Peregrino oil and gas field off the coast of Brazil to independent producer Prio SA, according to people familiar to the matter.】

item.title: 中国 10 年期收益率创历史新低，考验中国人民银行的耐心
item.description: 中国基准国债收益率跌至历史新低，考验着政策制定者遏制这一走势的决心。【原文：China’s benchmark government bond yield fell to a record low, testing policymakers’ resolve to stem the move.】

item.title: 随着印度央行转向减息，基金提高了印度债券的期限
item.description: 上个月，外国投资者抢购了期限较长的印度债券，这表明他们可能热衷于在印度央行可能降息之前锁定收益率。【原文：Foreign investors snapped up longer-tenor Indian bonds in the past month, a sign they may be keen to lock in yields before potential interest-rate cuts from the central bank.】

item.title: 丰田 52 亿美元回购库存股
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp. ）最近的回购行动加剧了其推动交叉持股解禁可能带来的不良副作用：其口袋里的库存股不断增加。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp.’s latest buyback compounded a potentially unwanted side effect of its push to unwind cross shareholdings: a growing backlog of treasury stock in its back pocket.】

item.title: 中国股票卖空者因打压而解套
item.description: 本周，随着中国股市暴跌加剧，中国股票交易商急于平仓，趁机在监管机构规定的最后期限前归还借入的股票。【原文：Chinese stock traders rushed to unwind their short positions this week as the country’s equities selloff worsened, taking the opportunity to return borrowed shares before a deadline imposed by regulators.】

item.title: 数据显示：暑假加剧日元波动
item.description: 随着夏季流动性的低迷放大了日本央行下一步政策举措不确定性的影响，近期日元波动率将进一步攀升。【原文：The recent increase in yen volatility is set to climb further as a summer time slump in liquidity amplifies the impact of uncertainty over the Bank of Japan’s next policy move.】

item.title: 汇丰银行、StanChart、新加坡银行贷款增长乏力
item.description: 汇丰控股公司和渣打银行以及新加坡的贷款机构将在贷款增长缓慢的背景下公布财报。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc and Standard Chartered Plc, along with Singapore lenders, will report earnings against a backdrop of slow loan growth.】

item.title: 创新招聘应用程序公司 Timee 将在日本上市
item.description: Timee公司是一家创新型工作匹配应用程序的开发商，致力于帮助日本解决严重的劳动力短缺问题。【原文：Shares of Timee Inc. — the developer of an innovative job matchmaking app helping Japan’s severe labor shortage — were untraded, poised to rise in their first day of trading.】

item.title: 交易员称韩国削减遗产税的计划将有助于股市上涨
item.description: 投资者认为，韩国数十年来首次降低遗产税率的举措值得欢迎，有助于刺激经济和股市。【原文：South Korea’s bid to lower its inheritance tax rate for the first time in decades is a welcome move that could help stimulate the economy and stocks, according to investors.】

item.title: 新加坡房价放缓，市场降温租金下跌
item.description: 在政府努力抑制房地产繁荣之后，新加坡第二季度私人住宅价格涨幅低于预期，租金也有所下降。【原文：Singapore private home prices rose less than estimated and rents edged down in the second quarter, following government efforts to tame the real estate boom.】

item.title: 疯狂 "日元涨势有可能最快于下周崩溃
item.description: 最近几周，投资者纷纷买入日元，押注利率最终将向日本倾斜。他们最快将在周三面临清算。【原文：Investors have fallen over each other in recent weeks to buy the yen on bets that interest rates are finally about to tip in Japan’s favor. They face a reckoning as soon as Wednesday.】

item.title: 台积电将在台风休市后加入全球科技股行情
item.description: 台风过后的两天休市期让全球投资者对人工智能的前景大失所望，台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：A selloff in Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. shares looks almost inevitable when trading resumes after a two-day typhoon break, during which global investors dramatically soured on the promises of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 大轮换交易让不那么显眼的人工智能赢家成为焦点
item.description: 有迹象表明，股票投资者对人工智能领军企业的快速发展产生了冷淡情绪，这也让一些不那么明显的技术繁荣受益者成为焦点。【原文：Signs that equity investors are getting cold feet over the rapid advances in artificial intelligence leaders have put a spotlight on some less obvious beneficiaries of the technology boom.】

item.title: 淡马锡支持的 EvolutionX 基金将重点从中国转向印度
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasak Holdings Pte.）和星展银行的合资企业 EvolutionX Debt Capital Pte.正将其投资重点从中国转向印度，以期在这个南亚国家不断扩大的私人信贷市场中占据更大份额。【原文：EvolutionX Debt Capital Pte., a joint venture between Temasak Holdings Pte. and DBS Bank, is shifting its investment focus to India from China, aiming to capture a bigger share of the South Asian nation’s expanding private credit market.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好科技股再度下挫拖累市场。私人信贷基金将目光投向拉丁美洲。消费者缩减冲击了上下游。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Renewed tech selloff drags down market. Private credit funds look to Latin America. Consumer retrenchment hits top and bottom lines. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中国经济疲软再起波澜，石油将迎来第三周下跌
item.description: 由于中国需求疲软给油价带来压力，抵消了美国库存减少带来的支撑，石油价格第三周下跌。【原文：Oil headed for a third weekly loss as weakness in Chinese demand pressured prices, offsetting support from lower US stockpiles.】

item.title: Hermes Li 旗下价值 90 亿美元的 Aspex 对冲基金上半年增长 21
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Hermes Li 的 Aspex Management（香港）有限公司上半年取得了两位数的回报，帮助该公司管理的资产增至 90 多亿美元。【原文：Hermes Li’s Aspex Management (HK) Ltd. posted double-digit returns in the first half, helping boost the firm’s assets under management to more than $9 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股市在轮换交易中下挫，日元坚持反弹：市场综述
item.description: 继华尔街股市进一步下跌后，周五亚洲股市走势平缓，因为投资者对大型科技公司的轮换交易表现出了兴趣。【原文：Asian stocks were primed for muted moves Friday following further falls on Wall Street as investors showed appetite for the rotation trade away from large technology companies.】

item.title: 支出增加，淡水河谷盈利低于分析师预期
item.description: 全球第二大铁矿石供应商淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）公布的第二季度业绩略低于分析师的预期，因为该公司面临着更高的支出。【原文：Vale SA, the world’s second-biggest iron ore supplier, posted second-quarter results that slightly trailed analyst estimates after facing higher expenses.】

item.title: 北达科他州小麦产量创纪录，小麦供应量将扩大
item.description: 北达科他州小麦产量创下历史新高，这将进一步扩大美国的谷物供应，并有助于抑制百吉饼等食品的通胀，这些食品的价格最近又开始上涨。【原文：Record-high wheat yields in North Dakota are set to further expand American grain supplies and should help to quell inflation for foods like bagels, where prices had recently started rising again.】

item.title: 马查多称委内瑞拉债权人受到过渡赔率上升的诱惑
item.description: 领导推翻马杜罗政权运动的玛丽亚-科里纳-马查多（María Corina Machado）说，随着反对派获胜的几率增加，一些赞成在尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统领导下进行重组的委内瑞拉债务持有人正在转变思路。【原文：Some of Venezuela’s debtholders who favored a restructuring under President Nicolás Maduro are shifting their thinking as odds of an opposition victory increase, said María Corina Machado, who leads the campaign to unseat the regime.】

item.title: 纽约养老基金施压美光达成工会协议
item.description: 纽约价值 2,600 亿美元的养老基金正在敦促美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：New York’s $260 billion pension fund is urging Micron Technology Inc. to adopt a global policy of labor neutrality, which would pave the way for workers at the company’s chip factories to form and join unions.】
